Author: Aida Enna
Name: Graphics Config
Description: Allows you to save/load/share graphics setting presets (based on your System Configuration menu) at any time, including when triggered by events like entering a battle, cutscene, duty, gpose, and more. Also supports conditions like loading into a city or foray areas.
Punchline: Save/load shareable graphics setting presets at any time or auto-load them during specified conditions like where you are or what content you are doing.
